meanings.sent1: The two socks were matched in color.
meanings.sent2: The twins wore matched outfits to the party.
meanings.sent3: The matched puzzle pieces fit perfectly together.
meanings.sent4: Her earrings matched the sparkle in her eyes.
meanings.sent5: The flowers in the garden were perfectly matched in size and color.

meanings.sent1: The matched gloves kept her hands warm.
meanings.sent2: The keys were matched to the corresponding locks.
meanings.sent3: The matched shoes completed his stylish look.
meanings.sent4: The curtains matched the cozy atmosphere of the room.
meanings.sent5: The flavors of the dish were perfectly matched to create a delicious meal.

meanings.definition: To be equal or similar to something else.
meanings.sent1: The number of apples matched the number of oranges.
meanings.sent2: Her painting matched the beauty of the sunset.
meanings.sent3: The cat's meow matched the pitch of the song on TV.
meanings.sent4: His determination matched his talent on the field.
meanings.sent5: The student's effort matched the teacher's high expectations.
